posts.title: Building Scalable Magento 2 Infrastructure with AWS and Docker
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to setting up a production-ready Magento 2 environment using AWS services, Docker containers, and CI/CD pipelines. Learn how to achieve 99.9% uptime and handle traffic spikes effectively.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Custom Magento 2 Module Development Best Practices
posts.excerpt: Essential guidelines for creating maintainable and scalable custom modules in Magento 2, including dependency injection, plugin usage, and testing strategies.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Automating Server Monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana
posts.excerpt: Step-by-step guide to setting up comprehensive server monitoring using Prometheus for metrics collection and Grafana for visualization and alerting.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Optimizing Magento 2 Performance: A Complete Guide
posts.excerpt: Comprehensive performance optimization techniques for Magento 2, covering caching strategies, database optimization, and frontend improvements.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Setting Up CI/CD Pipelines for E-commerce Applications
posts.excerpt: Learn how to implement robust CI/CD pipelines for e-commerce applications using AWS CodePipeline, ensuring zero-downtime deployments and automated testing.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Integrating Third-Party APIs in Magento 2
posts.excerpt: Best practices for API integration and error handling in Magento 2, including authentication, rate limiting, and data synchronization strategies.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Docker Best Practices for Development Environments
posts.excerpt: Creating efficient and consistent development workflows using Docker, including multi-stage builds, volume optimization, and development vs production configurations.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Building Responsive E-commerce Themes with Hyvä
posts.excerpt: Modern frontend development for Magento 2 using Hyvä theme, covering AlpineJS integration, Tailwind CSS optimization, and performance improvements.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt

posts.title: Security Hardening for Production Servers
posts.excerpt: Essential security measures for web servers, including firewall configuration, SSL setup, intrusion detection, and automated security monitoring.
posts.author: Bradley R. Clampitt
